# Create Channel

# Description

Create a public or a private channel in Slack.

# Untitled Section

text="Type the content"

# Configuration

* 
* Name - The name of the channel to create. This field supports String type input.
* Make channel private? - Whether the channel is private or not. Boolean value. The default value is False.









* Channel ID - The ID of the new channel. Automatically generated output variable.
* Channels - The output create channel. Automatically generated output variable.
